body.p:
I understand that two of our Military Companies here will in a short time secure New stores of arms and those they now have will be returned to the state Thinking perhaps we may need some here for home Guard I thought that I would apply to use for the use of these guns for the city If you should not want the use of them otherwise I have a fine Room the upper storey in the Engine House Near my office that I would use as an arsnal where I could attend to them and Keep them in order
and should they be wanting at any time by the state they shall be forth coming immediately

Respectfully
B F Graves
Our legislature will be apt to Receive some censure for not arming the state and not calling a convention

Lexington
And Apr 18. 1861
Jas W. Tate
